content: this bold and beautiful crochet throw is sure to become a focal point in any room designed with the perfectly coordinated self-striping shades of bernat blanket o go you ll stitch from corner-to-corner in double_crochet to create a gorgeous graphic pattern over the entire area of this blanket it s a versatile throw that s easy to customize in any colors you wish for a superb gift yarns for model bernat® blanket™ o go™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a tiramisu 42030 3 o gos contrast b rose gold 42019 3 o gos
